source.b1d649b5:
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
%matplotlib inline

import seaborn as sns
sns.set_style('whitegrid')

from wordcloud import WordCloud, STOPWORDS

df = pd.read_csv('../input/spotify-artist-track-data/spotify_data.csv')
print('Setup completed.')
source.6d7a42ed:
df = df.groupby('track_id', as_index=False)\
    .apply(lambda d: d.iloc[0])\
    .sort_values('popularity', ascending=False)
source.17f47ac4:
plt.figure(figsize=(12, 8))
plt.title("Distribution of Popularity")
sns.kdeplot(df['popularity'], shade=True, color='green')
plt.xlabel('Popularity')
plt.xlim(0, 100)
plt.show()
source.323f3a3f:
artist_noccurences = df.groupby('artist_name', as_index=False).size().sort_values('size', ascending=False).head(15)

plt.figure(figsize=(12, 8))
plt.title('Artists by no. of occurences in data')
sns.barplot(x=artist_noccurences['artist_name'], y=artist_noccurences['size']
            , palette=sns.color_palette("crest", artist_noccurences.shape[0]))
plt.ylabel('No. of occurences')
plt.xlabel('Artist')
plt.xticks(
    rotation=45, 
    horizontalalignment='right' 
)
plt.show()
source.e1131960:
popular_songs = df.head(15)

plt.figure(figsize=(12, 8))
plt.title('Most Popular Tracks')
sns.barplot(y=popular_songs['popularity'], x=popular_songs['track_name'], palette=sns.color_palette("crest", popular_songs.shape[0]))
plt.ylabel('Popularity')
plt.xlabel('Track')
plt.xticks(
    rotation=45, 
    horizontalalignment='right' 
)
plt.ylim(80, 100)
plt.show()
source.6c8cc5df:
popular_artists = df.groupby('artist_name', as_index=False)\
    .agg({'popularity': 'mean'})\
    .sort_values('popularity', ascending=False)\
    .head(15)

plt.figure(figsize=(12, 8))
plt.title('Most Popular Artists')
sns.barplot(x=popular_artists['popularity'], y=popular_artists['artist_name'], palette=sns.color_palette("crest", popular_artists.shape[0]))
plt.ylabel('Artist')
plt.xlabel('Popularity')
plt.xlim(70, 100)
plt.show()
source.0b2dedd9:
artist_string = ' '.join(list(df['artist_name']))
wordcloud_artist = WordCloud(width= 1200, height = 800, random_state=1, background_color='white', stopwords = STOPWORDS)\
    .generate(artist_string)

plt.figure(figsize=(14, 14))
plt.imshow(wordcloud_artist) 
plt.axis("off")
plt.show()
source.1e8c6154:
track_string = ' '.join(list(df['track_name']))
wordcloud_track = WordCloud(width= 1200, height = 800, random_state=1, background_color='white', stopwords = STOPWORDS)\
    .generate(track_string)

plt.figure(figsize=(14, 14))
plt.imshow(wordcloud_track) 
plt.axis("off")
plt.show()
